text.p: These are the leading stories in the Maltese press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Political parties put on biggest show of strength, holding mass meetings on the last Sunday of their electoral campaign.

- The newspaper carries just one word on its front page - Enormous - accompanied by a picture of a Nationalist Party mass meeting held on Sunday. Prime Minister Eddie Fenech Adami tells supporters to be wary of a Labour socialist agenda. He described the European Union as the guarantee for a better future for Malta.
- Front and back pages devoted to photo of a Labour Party mass meeting on Sunday. Labour leader Alfred Sant hits out at the government over corruption. REUTER
